attributes.action: ITV shouldn't be aloud to show any football related programmes.
attributes.additional_details: Adrian Chiles, Martin Allen's tops and just overall poor production. ITV really are useless when it comes to football. They shouldn't be aloud to have anything to do with football. Remember the England goal they flicked away from? Remember how they got rights for the Premier League highlights only for everyone to turn off and the rights to go back to the BBC? Stick to Emmerdale and Coronation Street.
